testCase.name: -- Facilities Controller -- * getFacilities should return a list of Facilities
-- Facilities Controller -- * getFacilityById should return a single Facility
-- Facilities Service -- * getFacilities should return array with all facilities
-- Facilities Service -- * getFacilities should return 1-4 of 16 facilities
-- Facilities Service -- * getFacilities should return 5-8 of 16 facilities
-- Facilities Service -- * getFacilities should return 9-12 of 16 facilities
-- Facilities Service -- * getFacilities should return 13-16 of 16 facilities
-- Facilities Service -- * getFacilities should return array with 4 facilities in TX
-- Facilities Service -- * getFacilityById should return a single Facility
-- Facilities Service -- * getFacilityById should throw NotFoundException if facility not found
